entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-02
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [.NET 7 Preview 2]Sporadic ArgumentException from ThreadLocal initialization #67491
  • Assertion failed 'codeGen->isFramePointerUsed() || varDsc->GetStackOffset() >= 0' #67488
    7.0.0
  • Migrate Microsoft.Extensions packages into their own Framework (and workload) #67487
  • [API Proposal]: Provide NamedPipesHttpMessageHandler #67480
  • [API Proposal]: `HttpResponseMessage.IsSuccessStatusCode(HttpStatusCode statusCode)` #67478
  • Linux x64 release SourceBuild build break in CI #67474
  • [API Proposal]: Retrieve GC configuration values #67471

Closed

  • Build warnings in package restore #11077
  • [API Proposal]: RegexRunner.IsWordChar #62603
    7.0.0
  • Configuration binder failed when getter of read only property throw exception #65710
    Future
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.ConfigurationBinder.BindProperty(PropertyInfo,object, IConfiguration, BinderOptions) – harmful call to PropertyInfo.GetValue(object) #52905
    7.0.0
  • Quic tests failing with Error Code: 0xEF850AE0 Stream aborted by peer #67476
  • Proposal: GC.GetConfig* API for getting GC config values #31450
    Future
  • NativeAOT scanner failure #65612
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize can't be reliably used with Utf8JsonReaders that have been resumed #67454
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_DangerousAcceptAllCertificatesValidator_Test.InvalidCertificateServers_CertificateValidationDisabled_Succeeds(url: \"https://wrong.host.badssl.com/\") #67473
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.PlatformHandler_HttpClientHandler_DangerousAcceptAllCertificatesValidator_Http2_Test.InvalidCertificateServers_CertificateValidationDisabled_Succeeds(url: \"https://wrong.host.badssl.com/\") #67475
  • NativeAOT Reflection-free mode: enum.IsDefined() shows different output #67477
  • Use of `EditorBrowsableState.Never` leads language service to claim it's gone #720
    5.0.0
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Systemd.SystemdHelpers.IsSystemdService does not work inside containers. #67203
    Future
  • Generalize runtest exclusion mechanism #4747
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Type activator should be order agnostic #67493
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Handle final elements in SpanHelpers.Contains for byte and char vectorized #67492
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution
  • [arm64] Addressing modes for SIMD #67490
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Don't force `TieredCompilation=0` for SuperPMI replay job #67489
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow null-based `ARR_ADDR`s #67486
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] EmccCompile: Add support for compiling sequentially #67483
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Cleanup legacy interop in System.Security.Principal.Windows #67479
    area-System.Security

Merged

  • Add {ReadOnly}Span ctor (internal for now) that takes a ref and no length #67447
  • build: fix corehost.proj dac injection unquoted path #67467
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Change ConfigurationBinder to avoid reading properties unnecessarily. #66723
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Fixed msquic method that's become void #67481
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Update System.Runtime.InteropServices.cs #67466
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 1696596 #67463
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove invalid assertion in InitializePropCache #67482
    area-System.Text.Json, needs-author-action, 7.0.0
  • Don't consider ShadowMethods reflectable #67421
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: Disable cast profiling by default #67460
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Infra fixes for bugs uncovered by testing of the JIT/Methodical merged tests #67393
    area-Infrastructure
  • Removed the hard heap limit heap balancing logic for regions + UOH and fixed infinite retries in case at the LOH boundary #67406
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Disable GitHub_35821 on arm64 #67472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable readytorun/coreroot_determinism test on GCStress due to failure #67468
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable ArrBoundBinaryOp under GCStress due to failure #67469
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Detect systemd when inside a container. #67288
    area-Extensions-Hosting
  • More XARCH `PUTARG_STK` CQ improvements #67400
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution

Updated

  • Reflection Invoke refactoring to support future byref-like and IL emit features #66357
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Removed JIT (uint) cast workaround to elide bound-checks in CoreLib #67448
    community-contribution
  • Fix incorrect format string arguments #67464
    area-Host, codeql
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix loop cloning of array of struct with array field #67130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoid pre-allocating large arrays in some scenarios for Enumerable.Chunk #67210
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • Added test for extracting zip files with invalid characters in Windows #67332
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-vm directory #62885
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [LoongArch64] coreclr-jit directory #62843
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, 7.0.0
  • [Draft] idea how to improve allocations when serializing primitive types #67223
    area-System.Xml, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Stop using `CLS_VAR` on x86 #67335
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Optimize range checks for X >> CNS and for short/byte indices #67141
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support immutable types with configuration binding #67258
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • JIT: Optimize unused array allocations #67205
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Llvm 13x #67416
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Introduce write barriers in wasm bindings, migrate to ref/out params, add gc safe regions #65994
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [wasm] Perf: Fixes for blazor_scenarios #67414
    NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [arm64] Add RCPC ISA (8.3+) and use ldap for volatile reads #67384
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Concatenate multiple cookies with semicolon #67455
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Stop passing StandardOptimizationData.mibc to crossgen2 multiple times for SPC #67458
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Provide the invalid value in the number parsing FormatException message #67415
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [draft] Use csel for conditional moves #67286
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove char[] allocations from RegistryKey #66918
    area-Microsoft.Win32, tenet-performance
  • changing CPU from int to double #66743
